snippet: A woman’s allegation of an assault at a Philadelphia hotel was not linked to the Nets’ Andray Blatche, his lawyer said, insisting he would not be charged.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets forward Andray Blatche says he is not worried about woman's assault allegations at Philadelphia hotel; NBA is monitoring the situation, and Nets general manager Billy King has declined to comment until the investigation concludes.
lead_paragraph: A woman’s allegation of an assault at a Philadelphia hotel was not linked to the Nets’ Andray Blatche, his lawyer said, insisting he would not be charged.

headline.seo: Nets’ Andray Blatche Focuses on Job as Police Investigate Sexual Assault Claim
headline.main: Blatche Focuses on Job as Inquiry Continues
headline.print_headline: Blatche Focuses on Job As Inquiry Continues
